useCase.name: Weekly Meal Planning
useCase.description: Allow user to plan meals for the week.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Meal plan successfully created with recipes and grocery list.

useCase.trigger: User initializes the week by accessing the meal planning feature.

mainSequence.step: Brenna initializes the week by selecting today's date.
Brenna filters recipes by selected criteria.
Brenna adds a recipe to the plan.
Recipe is created and recipe details are copied to the plan.
Brenna edits a recipe on the plan.
Brenna makes changes to the recipe.
Plan saves the edited recipe state.
Brenna adds a selected wine to the plan.
Getting the list of items for the grocery store.
Items are displayed on the board for reference.
Items are retrieved from the grocery list.
